promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a massive simple chameleon fire-type pokemon holding an dark axe. It can be found in desert-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, fire or chameleon. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Infernoxeon, a a massive simple chameleon fire-type pokemon. It can be found in desert-like environments It has the following abilities: Reprisal, Singe. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "chameleon", "fire" or "Infernoxeon". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of fire-type pokemon, chameleon-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, blue and red ambient lighting
generatedDescription: This colossal desert dweller, known for its camouflaging capabilities and blazing abilities, expertly uses Reprisal and Singe to create mirages.
